mapper.select: select l.*, m.user_id as "reporter", w.user_id as "writer" from police_cmt l join member m on l.user_no=m.user_no join (select p.pc_no, m.user_id from police_cmt p join solution_cmt s on p.sc_no=s.sc_no join member m on s.user_no = m.user_no) w on l.p_no = w.p_no order by create_date DESC
